display_information.name: BattleForge
display_information.description: Explore, battle, and loot together in a Slack-based text adventure.
display_information.long_description: BattleForge turns your Slack into a shared fantasy tavern. Party up with your teammates, explore dangerous zones, battle monsters, and haul home loot using simple DM commands. From quick skirmishes to long adventures, it is a lightweight game you can drop into between conversations.
